body_html: Only comment about the above code is that I put the layers in a list in there which doesn't work with certain function calls, but since module's _modules is an ordered dict, seems it would be easy to add them in _modules and use them that way.

body: Only comment about the above code is that I put the layers in a list in there which doesn't work with certain function calls, but since module's _modules is an ordered dict, seems it would be easy to add them in _modules and use them that way.
